@Name(value="org.jboss.seam.ui.entityConverterStore")
@Install(precedence=0)
@Scope(value=PAGE)
public class EntityConverterStore
extends org.jboss.seam.framework.MutableEntityController

Stores entity identifiers under a key, which can be used on a page
